in which they had taken those first steps. Both had changed greatly since they last met and both were in a hurry to show the changes that had taken place in them. 
"Oh, you damned dandies! Clean and fresh as if you'd been to a fete, not like us sinners of the line," cried Rost6v, with martial swagger and with baritone notes in his voice, new to Boris, pointing to his own mud-bespattered breeches. The German landlady, hearing Ros- tov's loud voice, popped her head in at the door.
